features: Countless Purposes: The floating solid and sturdy bookshelf is perfect for multi-use, you can use it in your kitchen as a pantry organizer, or spice rack. The shelf will make the perfect condiment, toiletry organizer, or great for kid’s room to get toys, books, etc. off the floor.

Functionality-wise: Organize your media stand to beautifully display your CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray. Showcase your exquisite taste in music, movies and books. You can create a reading corner that will impress all the bookworms out there.

Accentuate Walls: Create a wall photo collage without the hassle of making any arrangements, never worry about misaligned frames, damaged walls and dangerous leaning ledges that will cause hazards for the household.
Easy to Install: The durable floating shelf comes fully assembled, just decide on which wall space is available for decorating and mount it with the hardware included in the packaging.
Space Saver: The U-shaped shelf is perfect for housing plants, home accessories and decorative items. Create more floor space and move around freely in your small living room.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With Wallniture Bali Floating U Shelf, Keep the Focus on Your Collection Rather than the Floating Shelf Itself The thin design of Bali wall mounted shelf will create the illusion that your DVDs, CDs, books, picture frames, or whatever you display are floating on the wall

Bali wall shelf fits anywhere that you need decorative small shelf solutions! Great Makeup Organizer Bali metal storage shelf doen not only act as a cosmetics organizer but also as a perfume organizer. Its sleek design makes it ideal to be utilized in bedroom or bathroom decor Perfect Kitchen Pantry Organization and Storage Free up your kitchen storage cabinet space with Bali floating shelf for storage! Our U shape shelf can act as a spice rack or kitchen utensil holder while upgrading your kitchen decor Kids' Bookshelf and Toy Storage Use Bali metal shelf as a nursery bookshelf to store not only kids' books but also kids' toys and collectibles! This easy declutter cleaning way will not only create a fun kids' bedroom decor but also encourage good reading habits in your child

Get one or more Bali U shape wall shelf and complete your home decor! Floating Bookshelf Bali white shelf for wall provide you proper utilization of small space! Utilize them as a wall-mounted ladder shelf to keep your books with no worries of falling and create a little library while transforming your naked walls into a useful and stylish corner that enhances your home decor CD & DVD Storage Place Bali metal hanging shelf above your Tv stand to conveniently store your large movie collection and show off your precious family pictures, succulents, or other decorative room accessories to enhance your living room decor Gaming Room Decor If you have a variety o video games, Bali game organizer shelf set is great for you! Utilize them as console game storage, video game console organizer, or controller holder while adding a complementary touch to your gamer room decor by displaying some gaming stuff or cool stuff for your room

The unique design offers two different display forms 1. In the upward position. This creates great side support so you can lean different objects against, like books, DVDs & CDs 2. Facing downward for a wall shelf style to create seamless wall decorations for living room by showcasing everything from wall art to decorative picture frames, plants, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Read this if you are unsure about purchasing
reviews.reviewText: I was a little hesitant to purchase after reading reviews about the nail sets messing up people’s walls. I had zero issues with the installation but I also do know how to use the larger expansion nail piece that the nail sits in. I didn't learn how to do this until this year, but it’s extremely easy. If you are unsure I would recommend watching a quick youtube tutorial. Overall it took me about 10 min to set this shelf up by myself.It has been up for about a week now and I’m very happy with it. The sleek white minimalistic design was exactly what I was going for and I have zero complaints about the quality or sturdiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minimalist and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love how simple and minimalist this shelf is. It’s cute and keeps my dvds off the desk. And it was easy to install on my wall. It not only came with 4 screws and 2 metal anchors but a tiny bubble level tool to make sure it was straight. Depending on what you plan to store on this I would make sure it was properly anchored or secured to a stud. This shelf does have thickness and weight to it. I would say it can hold 28 dvds or 36 blu-rays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but worth it?
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what a precision-bent piece of painted metal should cost but it felt like too much. That said, I let my daughter buy them for her birthday gift and was impressed with the stiffness - these shelves are thick and the bolt you use to anchor them into drywall were pretty high-quality (at least to me). I thought it came with a quality paint-job. BTW: the kid likend them too. If you aren't the type of shopper who lays awake at night wondering if they could have saved a few more bucks on that purchase if they had only argued a few hours more, you might be pleased with your purchase..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shelf for book collections
reviews.reviewText: Nice shelf, super easy to install. I used the 3 small screws and is sturdy and looks great!I put it next to my desk, and because is so thin it really brings the beauty of the book covers.Just be aware, is just one unit. I tought I would receive 2 because of the pictures. But the description is accurate so I still think is worth 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice shelves for a clean look.
reviews.reviewText: The shelves were easy to install. I didn't use the included hardware, so I have no opinion on the hardware quality. I would have given a 5 star, except one of the four shelves came with considerable bowing that I couldn't fix by hand or with my available tools. This causes the books to sit unevenly and the sides to pinch in a little. Noticeable, but not worth the effort to rip out of the wall and return. Would love to see more color options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These simple shelves are sturdy and came exactly as advertised. They're minimalist and pretty basic without looking cheap; the white color is perfect, a little reflective but barely so, and doesn't look obviously metal.I chose the 17" shelves in hopes that I could drill them into studs on both sides, and the spacing worked out perfectly. They also look larger than I expected.Great shelves!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have a very distinct aesthetic and was wary that this bookshelf would look ugly but it looks minimalist and GREAT! my walls are white and the shelves blend in beautifully, I'm so happy I can finally see my books and they bring a great pop of color to the space. not to mention, great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It was easier than expected to install! The anchors are super secure and the little leveler it came with was adorable and super helpful. Definitely use a power drill though. I placed two shelves right next to other for more length and then went up exactly 1ft for each of the next rows. Came out great. the only thing I wish it that they are more inexpensive as I had to purchase 6.

La verdad las medidas y todo son justo lo anunciado, no he hecho pruebas de qué tanto peso podría soportar pero le puse varios libros grandes y no se siente NADA frágil. Bastante fácil de instalar (considerando que tengas el equipo necesario para taladrar la pared). Muy lindo y probablemente pida otro después, es justo el estillo sencillito que buscaba.
Overall very awesome product, wish it was a little bit longer. But differently is used for its purpose....
El material es de primera, por el color y la forma le da un toque de elegancia al lugar donde le coloques
Me gustó mucho el producto ya que es bastante elegante, pero lo que no me gustó fueron los taquetes, ya que estos a no ser que tengas una herramienta especial, no entrarán bien a la pared.
A bit expensive but beautiful and solid shelf.
